ppl

ppl are weird. u dont take others seriously when they treat u well and when they gave up on u. u want to be their best friend???!!! that is just so stupid.

sloppy

havnt been managing my blog for quite sometimes~~ going to have my Olvl prelim soon. very nervous. didnt really study for it. worried for my english. hope that it can pass well(praying hard~~ ) will try my best to update my blog. or so~~ lol .

about me

all right... i have been writing this blog for a week and yet i didnt introduce myself to ur all. so basically, i m 16 having my 'O' lvl examination this year. i m studing in a girls' school. (its fun and cool.. some times onli) we use tablet pc (check the net if u want to noe about it) to study.. i m in chess club.. but i m not nerdy k!!! chess is really fun... especially speed chess lol. anyway my school is hmmm.. after 3 years of studies there. i still dont have any idea ..how many stories it has. haaa. check it up urself. if u wanna to know abt it. the address if i didnt remember wrongly should be www.crescent.edu.sg and the one writing on the tablet pc is one of my best friend , she is in track and field. oh yar... english is not my 1st language. so if i make any mistake.... just bear with it haaa and chinese is my 1st language just in case u wanna to know.. some times i think its more difficult to study chinese than english cause the history behind it is much longer...... and more difficult to write the characters.. ... ok tats abt it .. i still have tons of homework to do ...so bb

Do u know

ok.. this is wat i learnt when i was on my way to school today. by eating 3 chocolate bars per mth... which is like 36 bars /year. will help u extend ur lifespan by about 1 year!! interesting right??

oh yar.. do u noe that there r actually more smokers in asia then western countries but why the risk of heart diseases / other illness/ death rates are much higher than in asia countries??

feel free to leave a comment

come and guess...

CNY- chinese new year

its coming soon. which is next week.
i will be recieving lots of red packets during CNY.. hohohohoho . k just in case u dont noe wat is red packets... its a red coloured paper packet that contain MONEYYYYYYYYYY given by ur family members or anyone who is ur older than u and is ur elder member of the family. * most important thing he/she must be married...

there u see. CNY is really fun. * especially with that money part.. haaaa .. k i m just kidding. CNY is when the family members all comes together to the eldest's house to have a dinner during the CNY eve and MUST STAY AWAKE during that night so as to help to "gain lifespan" for the family members...

that is the tradition and nowadays... the youngsters will... of course stay awake .. we are all very energetic and who will want to sleep so early during a holiday???

however, poor girl like me will have to study during CNY.. cause my XXXXing school arranged the examinations on the very next day of CNY.. . I M SOOOOO SOOOOO POOR THING!!!! ( i m trying to flood my blog with some water.. haa) 3 subjects/ day.. waaaaHHHHHH .. mummmy!!! i so poor thing.. my CNY plan destroyed by the school... waaaaHHHHHHH!!!!!!

pls sympathize me with some tags and comments plsssss .. i very very poor thing

Question of the Day!!

Question of the Day

John is 3 years old. he spent 10 minutes to walk from the park back to his house. John' s mom , sue, spent 2 minutes to walk from the park back to her house. Today John and sue came back together. why did they spent only 2 minutes to walk from the park back to their house??

come and GUESS))

How much do you worth?

check it out and tell me

31st DEC

ppl... wat do u think about been born on 31st dec?? i have 2 friends who shares the same birthday.. which is 31st Dec. our school terms starts on 3rd January. so if their mom managed to bear a little longer. i mean letting my friends stay in their womb a bit longer. they might be my juniors right?! and everything will be different. and 1 of the most important thing is that . during that day, the students will be having holiday thus they will not recieve any presents from the friends... most likely. so... i can save the money for myself to buy some candy ) i have sweet tooths... haaaaaa
but i think AbyssofFinality will not be angry with me.. haaa cause her birthday is on 31st dec. which is NY eve. haaaa too bad. no present for her. but mikki... u must remember to buy me one.. pencilbox!! haaa i still remember P

ps: dont worry, i will still buy u one~~ hopefully..

Pls take the test- ripped from MICHELLEWEEMEIXIA AGAIN :)

pls take the test.
mark yes-X
no- (nothing)

1.Gum has fallen out of your mouth while you were talking.-

2.Gum has fallen out of your mouth while you were NOT talking.]

3.You have jumped out of a moving vehicle.-

4.You have thought of something funny and laughed, then people gave you weird looks.-

5.You have ran into a tree/bush.-

6.You know that it IS possible to lick your elbow. -

7.You have tried to lick your elbow.-

8.You never knew that the Alphabet and Twinkle Twinkle Little Star have the same rhythm.-

9.You just tried to sing them.-

10.You have tripped on your shoelace and fallen.-

11.You have choked on your own spit.-

12.You have seen the Matrix and still don't get it.-

13.You've never seen the Matrix.-

14.You type only with two fingers.-

15.You have accidentally caught something on fire.-

16.You tried to drink out of a straw, but it went into your nose/eyes.-

17.You have caught yourself drooling.-

18.You have fallen asleep in class and started to talk/drool, or snore-

19.If someone says "fart" you laugh.-

20.Sometimes you just stop thinking.-

21.You are telling a story and forget what you were talking about.-

22.People often shake their heads and walk away from you.-

23.You are often told to use your "inside voice".-

24.You use your fingers to do simple math.-

25.You have eaten a bug.-

26.You are taking this test when you should be doing something more important.-

27.You have put your clothes on backwards or inside out, and didn't realize it.-

28.You've looked all over for something and realized it was in your hand.-

29.You ran around naked in your house.-

30.You break a lot of things.-

31.You tilt your head when you're confused.-

32.You have fallen out of your chair before.-

33.When you're lying in bed, you try to find pictures in the texture on the ceiling.-

34.The word "ummmmm" is used many times a day.-

35.You have ran into a glass/screen door.-

Multiply the no. of answers that u have marked X by 3

and tell me ur percentage too
i will tell u wat this test is about tomorrow

Friends are like bras: close to your heart and will always t

Yan ting is a councilor in the school. she is extremely hyper and endo at all times.. full of energy . very cute gurl.

i recieved one email from her through the MLG- microsoft learning gateway..
tat reads

'Dearest Crescentians,<--" crescent girls' students"

MLG may be a platform for us to voice out our opinions but please, do not take advantage of this by sending mass emails (asking around for lost stuff is still tolerable) or use it to sent miscs emails to frame/hurt your friends. (we dont need to know which teacher you love/hate or who's engaged and what not)
I believe that the previous email sent by NUR DIYANINGSIH BTE AMRUN was not sent by her but someone who hacked into her account.
To prevent further hacking cases such as the above, I greatly urge all of you to CHANGE YOUR PASSWORDS and save your bitching/ranting/gossiping away from MLG as most of us would agree isnt very becoming of a Crescentian.
You might find me such annoying or a busybody but please do not get me wrong, I am not pinpointing anyone,seriously(:
After all, “Friends are like bras: close to your heart and will always there for support.” so please cherish your friends during your 4 fours in Crescent and life would be alot more meaningful(:

Sorry to bore you with such a longwinded email.

Yours sincerely,
A Crescentian."

that is rather cute of her.. i like the phrase " FRIENDS ARE LIKE BRAS: CLOSE TO YOUR HEART AND WILL ALWAYS THERE FOR SUPPORT.' that is rather true. hahaha lol

A Cool $25 Million for a Climate Backup Plan

Richard Branson offered a $25 million prize to anyone who figures out how to remove a billion tons of carbon dioxide per year from the atmosphere

this is wat i think abt it. ITS RATHER IMPOSSIBLE!! we have tons and tons of Co2 in our atmosphere. we need it for survival. the global warming will take place, ice age will come again. these cannot be stopped but can be pushed back as long as we know how to prevent and reduce... reuse as well as recycle the rubbish tat we created.

we should be clear that the weather is changing drastically. maybe u cannot feel it. but i believe most of u here had watched the movie THE DAY AFTER TOMORROW right?! that will happen... one day. maybe not in our time but think about ur futhur genernations. ppl think. pls be more self aware and keep our earth in gd condition. we cannot always relay on our government, we need to relay on ourselves. Maybe one fine day, the machine that can absorb Co2 will be created .. but when will tat happen? tomorrow or next week?? animals are getting endangered nowadays. why? because we poach them?? no. not really but because of the damage we did to our envirnoment and thus causing both the man and animals to suffer.

i m not here to tell ya to stop driving.. smoking (smoking maybe.. will be gd for ur health) or causing fire or so but to asking/convincing ya to be more aware of our surrounding ... our mother nature... our society. that r lot more things other than urself. so ppl look out for the interesting things that is taking place around u!!

ps: happy Valentine... after this longwinded post.. or essay maybe... haaa

Random

okie. i was having my common test lately...
just finished my geo,bio and lit today.. kind of rushing through everthing not so sure of whether i can pass them or not. but hopeful will (fingers cross). 3 out of 9 classes (same grade) moved down to ground floor since Jan and we are still at lvl 6~~~~ really tired of climbing up the stairs for 3 yrs already:'(

but the onli thing that is great about lvl 6 is that its coolin~~ haaaa. i heard lots of complains from my friends on the ground floor! haaaa haaa . suits themselves right. hohoho.. joking. i m not that mean.. (blink~~blink)

having maths and physic on monday and chem... Amaths and chinese paper2 on tuesday then... freedom... yipeee.. then holiday.. then test...test....test...exams...exams....exams..
but as comparing to those who are working.. school is fun.. exam is nothing.. cause u had wat i had b4.. and we dont have office politics but class parties.. lots of sweets** chocolates**candy**lollipops**twisties**crackers**all the yummy stuffs that are banded from bring up to the class. hahaha dont tell my teachers.. but actually. my form teacher is really open and crack jokes with us... she is the maid of the class.. haaa. cause she sweeps the floor for us... hee. she is so nice. we love her. she had nv scolded us b4 but we are extremely scared of her sometimes bcause we do respect her when it comes to serious things.

i love all my teachers.. all young at heart... except one.. who dont really teach me.. MRS .DT. i m really lucky . why?? cause i didnt had her for my maths.. (sweat) she is those kind or teacher who will say.." ladies---- [cause i m in a girl school and our school motto is ladies and leaders of tomorrow]--- i dont want to leacture u all because all of u are so sweet (we blink...blink...blink..) and graceful. but u all have to noe that i m here to help u study so please give me ur attention. (smile)" then she goes " so lets turn to pg XXX of ur ten years series and do qns blar..blar...blar..." then after she finished this sentence.... "hmmm. shall we do it together...???" <-- that i suppose is a qns.. but she continued " ok take out ur pen and foolscap paper. draw ur margin with a 30 cm long ruler. write down ur name.....blarblarblar"

k after i had typed such a long essay abt this teacher.. u can imagine how tried and how my friends felt during her lessons ..

i m trying to emphasize here is that ... TEACHERS!!! WE R 16 ALREADY.. I DONT SEE THE NEED OF TELLING US TO DRAW MARGIN USING 30CM LONG RULER!!! and blar..blar... blar... further more she always eats into our recess and lunch time. where we onli have 35 mins to Q,buy,eat,return the plates.... climb all the way up to the 6 lvl from one end of the school to the other end....

k i noe i m really very random.. haaa just hear me complain abt my.... teacher.. (luckily she dont teach me.. hohohho) too bad from those under her...

-bye-

BORED

alright.. i write nth here.. then nobody comes in -.-
k.. my day's boring. had class and chinese composition class in the afternoon. nothing much.. its always the same. but i just dont understand... why do i have to go for that chinese composition class???!!! i really dont think that i need to.. . -.- wat a waste of my time. i can finish more than 100 MCQ questions for my TYS lor.... -.- and the tea kept on pronouncing our name wrongly.. wats wrong with her.. haix..

wat a boring day..

calculate ur AGE!! (fun)

This test is very accurate. is to calculate how old u r.

so if its effective leave me a message

step 1: choose a number (1 -7)

this is the no. of times where u want to go out in a week

step2: mulitiply that no. by 2

step3: plus 5 to the product

step4: mulitiply by 50 again

step5: add 1757 if u birthday had passed already if not , add 1756

step6: subtract the number that u had obtained by the year that u were borned in.

so.... u will get an answer with 3 digits.

the 1st no. is the no of time tat u want to shop in a week

the others.... obviously is ur age. haaa

very accurate right?!

do tell ur friend about this~~
